articles.author: Harry Fletcher
articles.title: Study of oldest footprint ever may change the entire history of humanity - indy100
articles.description:
It’s not often that a single scientific discovery manages to change the way we think about the entire history of humanity.
An ancient footprint has been newly uncovered, and it turns out that humans were walking around 30,000 years earlier than we previously …
